name: Innocence Or Money - Prelude
description:
Innocence Or Money Prelude is the intro of Jennifer story, who is an innocent girl from a little town named Greensdale, she has lived all her life there with her sister Jessica and her uncle. She also has a boyfriend called Mike. One of her dreams is to go to the big city so she will pack everything and take the journey of her life!

She will rent a room and start cleaning to earn money, from that moment she will find ways to make more money by finding new jobs in the city and maybe by taking some decisions that well... let's say that they are not morally correct. You will be able to select what she has to do in certain situations. Will you take the morally correct decision or you will corrupt her to the bone and see how deep the rabbit hole goes?... It will depend on your choices.

You will decide if she prefers... Innocence Or Money

* IoM is a work in progress the Prelude is available for everyone and is the Intro of the game, in each update more content / characters / scenes will be added to the game *
